Packages 
Package Description
apple.dts.samplecode.osxadapter  
com.pixelmed.anatproc
Classes for encapsulating and extracting textutal and coded anatomic information.
com.pixelmed.apps
Various miscellaneous applications.
com.pixelmed.convert
Classes for converting proprietary image formats to DICOM.
com.pixelmed.database
Abstracts any underlying database support for applications using the DICOM toolkit and needing access to persistent storage of entities in the DICOM information model.
com.pixelmed.dicom
Classes for constructing, reading, writing and manipulating DICOM composite objects.
com.pixelmed.display
Classes for displaying DICOM composite objects, including images and spectra.
com.pixelmed.display.event
Classes for processing events related to displaying and navigating through images and spectra.
com.pixelmed.displaywave
Classes for displaying ECG waveforms, including DICOM and SCP-ECG files.
com.pixelmed.dose
Classes for encapsulating and extracting radiation dose information.
com.pixelmed.doseocr
Classes for extracting radiation dose information from screen images and transforming into Dose SR objects.
com.pixelmed.event  
com.pixelmed.ftp
FTP transfer of files.
com.pixelmed.geometry
Classes for posting localizer and other orthogonal images with projections or intersections of images.
com.pixelmed.network
Classes for sending, receiving, querying and retrieving DICOM composite objects on the network, as well as supporting lower level functions.
com.pixelmed.query
Encapsulation of DICOM queries into a higher level abstraction that supports creation of a tree model based on the results of a query, and a graphical user interface to that model.
com.pixelmed.scpecg
Classes for reading SCP-ECG files.
com.pixelmed.server
Implements a DICOM storage server that provides a database, DICOM query and retrieval, and Web Access to DICOM Objects (WADO) .
com.pixelmed.slf4j
Implements a thin wrapper around a subset of classes and methods of SLFJ.
com.pixelmed.test
Classes for unit testing.
com.pixelmed.transfermonitor  
com.pixelmed.utils
Various miscellaneous utilities, mainly static methods.
com.pixelmed.validate
A package for validating composite instances against the corresponding DICOM standard IOD.
com.pixelmed.web
Implements Web Access to DICOM Objects (WADO) as defined in DICOM PS 3.18 (ISO 17432).
